sentences.english: My birthday at the Army Day.
August The first day of August is Army Day.
sentences.chinese: 八月的第一天是建軍節。

sentences.english: August the first is Chinese Peoples Liberation Army Day.

sentences.english: The first day of August is Army Day.
sentences.chinese: 八月的第一天是建軍節。

sentences.english: So, Aug. 1 of every year is our Army Day.
sentences.chinese: 每年的八月一日是的建軍節。

sentences.english: August the first is the Army Day of the Chinese People 's Liberation Army .
sentences.chinese: 八月一日是中國人民解放軍的建軍節。

sentences.english: Today is Army day in China. My cousin was a serviceman one year ago.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中國的建軍節，我表哥在一年前成爲了軍人。

sentences.english: It was Army Day. Our class visited a signal company of the Donghai Sea fleet.
sentences.chinese: 八一建軍節，我們班參觀了東海艦隊某通信連。

sentences.english: This is the highest honor that our country can award a serviceman .
sentences.chinese: 今天是中國的建軍節，我表哥在一年前成爲了軍人。

sentences.english: Aug. 1 of every year is our Army Day.
sentences.chinese: 每年的八月一日是我們的建軍節。
